title: Labour conference: Angela Rayner stands by calling Boris Johnson 'scum'
content:
1. Labour conference: Angela Rayner stands by calling Boris Johnson 'scum'  BBC News
  2. UK Labour deputy leader calls governing Conservatives 'scum'  Reuters UK
  3. UK Labour politician defends calling government 'scum'  Associated Press
  4. Angela Rayner knows using the word ‘scum’ still doesn’t compare to some of Boris Johnson’s remarks  The Independent
  5. U.K. Labour Politician Defends Calling Government 'Scum'  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
